sub_title: Program Coordinator | HR professional | Management trainee | ManpowerGroup
summary:
🙋🏽 Hi there, my name is Suriënna (pronounced as (Su-rie-jenna).
🎓 I graduated with a bachelor's degree in HRM, currently I work as a management trainee / HR BP within ManpowerGroup.
🔋 My passion in the HR field lies with topics such as absenteeism and vitality, talent acquisition, organizational culture (diversity and inclusion), performance management and I like to delve into complex cases in which I can advise and unite various stakeholders.

► The most important aspect of all the roles I have been able to fill is creating and/or contributing to a safe, inclusive and happy organization. I believe that my strength lies in facilitating knowledge and advice, coaching and advising various stakeholders in the field of HR-related services.

► As an HR professional I have experience and affinity with:

HR Advice | Various case histories, including dismissal , absenteeism, the HR cycle - from onboarding to off boarding and other common HR themes.

Talent Acquisition | From very specific functions to volume recruitment. From recruitment and retention to negotiating terms of employment.

Project Coordination | Simplifying abstract matter into understandable concepts. From idea to complete courses or from an issue to an improvement or implementation process.

In addition to my substantive knowledge, I also have the power to translate abstract matters into understandable language. I have the ability to connect and collaborate with different people and do I think it is important that HR supports the business.

👋 Don't hesite to connect if we are in the same industry or if I can help you find a job trough my network!

projects.title: Buddytalk 2017
projects.description:
Als projectmedewerker heb ik binnen het project buddytalk een jongere van het praktijkcollege begeleid. Het project gaat over het ontdekken van elkaars beleef werelden. 
Tijdens dit project heb ik met mijn buddy gewerkt aan onderwerpen zoals ''een nieuwe leeromgeving'', de toekomst, school/werk en natuurlijk ook hoe bepaalde processen er uitzien als je opgroeit en gaat werken. Natuurlijk was er ook veel tijd voor gezelligheid en persoonlijke input.  

Mijn verantwoordelijkheden als projectmedewerker bestonden uit : 

°  Het meeten van van buddy circa 1 a 2 x per maand
°  Begeleiden bij het aanvliegen van persoonlijke vraagstukken

contributors.headline: Program Coordinator | HR professional | Management trainee | ManpowerGroup

projects.title: Coaching 50+
projects.description:
Als projectmedewerker heb ik binnen het project coaching 50+ ben ik samen met een 50+ er opzoek gegaan naar zijn of haar talent en op welke manier niet in te zetten is in het huidige werkveld. 
Binnen dit project was het de bedoeling dat er samen een opstapje gemaakt werd van ''bijna in de bijstand'' naar weer solliciteren en werken. 
Binnen de kaders van dit project heb ik coachingsgesprekken gevoerd en praktische vaardigheden die ik beheers overbrengen op de 50+ er. 

Mijn verantwoordelijkheden als projectmedewerker bestonden uit : 
°Coachingsgesprekken voorbereiden 
°Coachgesprekken houden

contributors.headline: Program Coordinator | HR professional | Management trainee | ManpowerGroup

projects.title: Onderzoek naar talentbeleving bij kinderen @ Winnr talentplatform
projects.description:
Als projectleider heb ik samen met Kevin Heugen en Natatcha Smulders een onderzoek opgezet naar talentbeleving bij kinderen rond de profielkeuze leeftijd. In opdracht van Winner zijn wij opzoek naar de definitie van talent volgens kinderen, wat ze van talent vinden en of ze talent bij zichzelf herkennen en er mee aan de slag willen / durven gaan. Winner kan hierdoor een op maat gemaakt talentplatform ontwikkelen waarop kinderen laagdrempelig aan de slag kunnen met hun talent. 

Mijn taken als projectleider bestonden uit : 

° Het verduidelijken van de casus zoals deze aangeleverd was door de opdrachtgever
° Het plannen van de vooruitgang van het project en de evaluatie momenten
° Contact onderhouden met de opdrachtgever 

In mijn uitvoerende rol nam ik verantwoordelijkheid voor :
° Zorgen voor theoretische onderbouwing voor het onderzoek 
° Het schrijven van de inleiding en andere delen van het onderzoeksrapport

contributors.headline: Program Coordinator | HR professional | Management trainee | ManpowerGroup

projects.title: Wat is talent ? @ Onderzoek lectoraat Dynamische Talentinterventies naar de definitie van talent
projects.description:
Als mede-projectmedewerker heb ik binnen het project het project gepland en de uitvoering van het onderzoek gedaan.  Het project is opgezet als introductie onderzoek voor het nieuwe HRM lectoraat. Want zonder eenduidige definitie van talent is het moeilijk om te bepalen waar je over praat. 

Samen met 3 andere studenten zijn wij zijn het symposium dynamische talentinterventies op zoek gegaan naar de definitie van geluk volgens de bezoekers die avond. Ook hebben wij die zelfde vraag aan 50 studenten gesteld, namelijk : Wat is talent  ? 

Daarna hebben we onze bevindingen van dit onderzoek verwerkt tot een rapport dat hopelijk eind mei 2017 gereed zal zijn voor publicatie.

Mijn verantwoordelijkheden  bestonden uit : 


° Het opzetten en plannen van het onderzoek 
° Het mede-uitvoeren van het project o.a het onderzoek uitvoeren, analyseren en rapporteren

contributors.headline: Program Coordinator | HR professional | Management trainee | ManpowerGroup

projects.title: Sollicitatietraining afstudeerders @ SPECO Tilburg
projects.description:
Als  projectleider heb ik samen met Kevin Heugen een traject opgezet voor afstudeerders van Fontys SPECO Tilburg. Het was de bedoeling dat wij HRM studenten wierven die de afstudeerder adviseert in  
Het project betrof 150 afstudeerders die een tentamen solliciteren moesten afronden nog voor ze officieel aan het laatste deel van het afstuderen konden beginnen. 

Mijn taken als projectleider bestonden  uit : 

° Het verduidelijken van de casus zoals deze aangeleverd was door SPECO Tilburg
° Het plannen van de vooruitgang van het project en de evaluatie 
° Het werven van de HRM'ers in spe binnen Fontys HRM Tilburg & Eindhoven 
° Het plannen  en coördineren van de 6 oefenavonden 
° De nazorg voor de studenten - het verzorgen van digitaal naslagwerk met tips voor solliciteren
° De nazorg voor de klant  -  het proces evalueren en een advies schrijven voor het volgende jaar 
°De administratie van de werkstudenten bijhouden

In de uitvoering heb ik :

°  CV's + sollicitatiebrieven beoordeeld 
°  Oefengesprekken gevoerd met de topsportstudenten

contributors.headline: Program Coordinator | HR professional | Management trainee | ManpowerGroup

projects.title: Meet & Eat @ Jongerenwerk Tilburg
projects.description:
Als projectleider heb ik samen met andere propedeuse en tweedejaars studenten korte workshops verzorgd voor nieuwe Nederlanders tijdens het project Meet & Eat.
Als projectleider heb ik actief geworven naar studenten die graag in aanraking zouden willen komen met vluchtingen van hun eigen leeftijd en samen met mij een deel van een workshop te schrijven over solliciteren en werk zoeken in Nederland. Onderwerpen konden zijn de sollicitatiebrief, de motivatiebrief en de werkcultuur. 



Mijn taken als projectleider bestonden uit : 
° Het  werven van studenten 
° Samen met de (groep) student(en) het onderwerp doorspreken en de workshops voorbereiden 
° De nazorg voor de nieuwe Nederlanders o.a cv in orde maken - hulp bij solliciteren  

In de uitvoering heb ik :

° Workshops gegeven

contributors.headline: Program Coordinator | HR professional | Management trainee | ManpowerGroup

profile_positions.description:
As a management trainee, I get a platform to develop my leadership qualities trough a two year program. 

Additional roles within my traineeship 
- Coordinator Refugee Talent Hub (CSR partnership)
- Founder and coordinator affinity network for multicultural talent NL

Skills Developed: share and stakeholder Management | recruitment - and selection | coaching | networking | team building | leadership
profile_positions.title: Management Trainee

profile_positions.description:
Projectmanager for various traineeship trajectories within the IT label of ManpowerGroup. Focused on creating IT traineeships for both clients and train-to-market solutions. 

Achievements:
-	Set up and launched the first data analytics trainee track for nontechnical university graduates.
-	Project managed the internal affairs for the Microsoft Consultant trainee track.
-	Developing a 2023 forecast based on market demand in the technical work field. 

Responsibilities:
-	Seeking out new labour market trends to initiate and develop traineeships.
-	Managing different projects (traineeships) from the initiation phase until the traineeship launch.
-	Advised and worked alongside the recruitment team to onboard recruits. 
-	Advised and worked with the marketing team to create content and highlight our traineeships in the market via various marketing channels.

Skills developed: Share- and stakeholder management | Employment Law | Client onboarding | financial forecasting | Market research | Marketing and content | Planning en organization| Coaching | informal leadership| Time Management | Project Planning
profile_positions.title: Program Coördinator | Projectmanager

profile_positions.description:
Within the manpower brand, I was allocated as a recruitment specialist to aid one of their enterprises' Clients VGZ staff has different types of costumers facing and administrative (MBO/HBO/WO) roles within the first eight months of my traineeship. 


Achievements:
-	Filled 30+ FTE with a team of two recruiters for a major healthcare provider in the Dutch Market.
-	Filled in the position of jr. team lead within my recruitment team delegating tasks, and coaching others in their recruitment practices. 
Responsibilities:
-	Tasked with recruitment for 4 sub-areas within the companycustomerumer facing roles. 
-	On the customer user side, I was tasked with handling Monthly Business RevieCustomerumer engagement, advisory within the recruitment processes and share- and stakeholder management in general.
-	On the employee side I was tasked with general HR administration and employee retention.
-	Internally I substituted for the team lead and assisted with capacity planning within the whole team (6 fte) and general problem solutions in various areas (e.g., with contracting, payments, employees, or clients). 

Skills developed: Share- and stakeholder management | Employment Law | employee onboarding | talent acquisition | coaching | Market research | Planning en organization| recruitment | informal leadership| team building | Time management
profile_positions.title: Account – and Recruitment Specialist - Manpower

profile_positions.description:
Within ATO-GEAR I was tasked with talent acquisition up until senior management roles to staff the company and develop an HR department. 

Achievements in my role as manager:
-	Filled 15+ FTE over the course of 12 months across the Netherlands, UK and DACH region. 
-	Set up and manage onboarding procedures for both staff and development roles to retain talent. 
-	Coached 4 junior employees as a performance coach and to build professional soft skills.

Responsibilities:
-	Owner of the recruitment process from developing the job profiles to sourcing, screening, and handling the contract negotiations. 
-	Owner of both the on- and offboarding process and performance management cycle 
-	Developing the HR department from scratch e.g., building and implementing policies and processes. 
-	Developing and executing various projects in the field of pension schemes, relocation, hiring from foreign nations, and onboarding.

Developed Skills: HR management | Project management | Coaching | Training and development | integrity | Absence - and case management | conflict management | Bad news conversations | Negotiate | Steering power | change management
profile_positions.title: HR-manager

profile_positions.description:
Besides being responsible for HR I also filled in 20% of my time with office management tasks. 


Achievements in my role as an Office manager:
-	Set up a health and safety procedure (RIE). 
-	Substituted for the marketing manager in their absence leading marketing meetings and projects. 

Responsibilities included:
-	General day-to-day office work e.g., customer service-related tasks, purchasing of needed materials and aiding finance in structuring their processes. 
-	Working within the staff team and assisting other members of the business support team to ensure the efficiency of the department is kept to a maximum.
-	Owner of the safety and security manual and guidelines.
-	Producing reports, letters, presentations and other documents for client meetings and internal use.
-	Substituting for both the marketing manager and the customer service rep. 



Skills developed: Business Support | Safety | Planning en Organization| Recruitment | Informal leadership | Team Building | Time Management | Efficiency | Customer Service B2B and B2C |
profile_positions.title: Officemanager

profile_positions.description:
Besides my role as advisor, I also substituted for the store managers in both Tilburg and Den Bosch during sick leave periods, weekends and during vacations. 

My main responsibilities: 
- Organise a stand-up with the team and delegate tasks and responsibilities among the team.
- Store administration and customer service-related tasks. 
- Time and turnover registration, administration and sporadically resource planning. 


Skills developed: Leadership | Plans | Customer Service | Building customer relationships | Time management | Performing under pressure | sale | Revenue Administration and Personnel Planning | Styling and presentation | Budgeting.
profile_positions.title: Keyholder retail

profile_positions.description:
During my studies, I had the desire to work in an advisory role to work on my advisory, commercial and people skills.

My responsibilities:
- Active sale of clothing (women's, men's and children's fashion) and luxury household goods.
- Customer service activities such as handling returns, complaints and orders.
profile_positions.title: Sales Advisor

profile_positions.description:
During the last year of my applied science degree, I interned as an HR advisor aiding team leads, managers and the business to help them develop their teams. As well as working on different HR-related projects. 

Achievements during my internship:
-	My research regarding how to harmonize companies with different working conditions while keeping the employees happy. My implantation plan was rewarded by the company with a ‘’9.0’’. 
-	My work for the harmonization plan regarding job profiles – I rewrote more than 30 job profiles with updated responsibilities to have them benchmarked. 


Responsibilities included:
-	Processing HR administration (payroll, contracts, changes).
-	Absenteeism management for non-staff personal inc. management and project coordination for absenteeism prevention projects and a team lead training on sick leave prevention.
-	Making policy proposals to management including implementation proposals for employee and leadership development, and harmonization of job profiles.
-	Organizing company affairs for staff and MT, including birthdays, condolences, anniversaries, and other festivities.
-	Advising managers on personnel issues, problems, conflicts, cooperation problems and training issues. 


Skills developed: Planning en organization | Recruitment | Team building | Time management | efficiency | HR advisory | Diversity and inclusion | Compensations and benefits | Training coordination | Purchasing | Employment law | Collective employment agreements | Absenteeism | Vitality management for employees | Applied research|
profile_positions.title: HR advisor (Graduate / Thesis Intern)

profile_positions.description:
During my internship, I worked alongside the people and culture generalist of the Eindhoven team working both on my HR advisory skills and project coordinating skills as well as working on my research on vitality in retail logistics. 

Achievements during my internship:
-	My research regarding ‘’who is responsible for keeping employees healthy – the employee or employer and my internship were both graded with an 8.0.   

Responsibilities included:
-	Processing HR administration and mutations (payroll, contracts, changes).
-	Absenteeism management for different retail divisions in the company.
-	Advising managers on personnel issues, problems, conflicts, cooperation problems and training issues under the watchful eye of my mentor in the company.

Skills developed: Planning en organization| corporate recruitment | recruitment advisory | Diversity and inclusion | Applied research | HR administration | Employment Law | Event Planning
profile_positions.title: HR Generalist ( Internship)

profile_positions.description:
In the second of my bachelor's, I opted for an internship year in ''my own company'' – which combined self-study, classes and managing my consultancy firm. In the tab Projects, all my projects and responsibilities are described. 

Skills developed: Coaching | Advise | Research | Relationship management | Time management | Coordination | Presentation skills | Motivate | Recruitment | Research.

Main achievements:

- Writing a recruitment blueprint for the growing start-up
- Developing a performance management cycle

Skills developed: Performance management | Developing processes | Recruitment and Selection | English | Cultural Sensitivity

.
profile_positions.title: HR employee

profile_positions.description:
In my gap year, I worked at a small temporary employment agency to cover leave replacement. I took over all recruitment activities.

My responsibilities:
- Maintaining contact with (potential) customers and employees in the field.
- Sourcing, recruiting and selecting candidates for current and new vacancies.
- Writing texts for vacancies, quotations, and offers.
- Processing payroll changes.


Developed skills: Recruitment and Selection | Recruitment | Commercial Writing
profile_positions.title: Intercedent

profile_positions.description:
During my secondary education, I worked as a sales employee at Promiss.

In this role I was responsible for:

Main achievement:
- Taking over the (assistant) store manager role during illness and leave.

Responsibilities:
- Advising customers and selling our collection.
- Visual merchandising.
- Checkout work, handling complaints and administrative tasks in the stores
- In the absence of the store manager responsible for the general administration, bank deposit, allocating tasks, handling customer questions and maintaining the shop-in-shop in the V&D.


Developing skills: Sales administration | Sales | Customer Service.
profile_positions.title: Sales Advisor

profile_positions.description:
During my training as a legal assistant I choose to intern in a more commercial field to prep myself for a career in HR, I did an internship as an intermediary at a branch.

My responsibilities included:
- Independently recruiting and selecting candidates for various clients (food, government, production and office positions).
- The administrative processing of job applications, sick leave and (new) contracts.
- Filling in (ad-hoc) planning requests for various customers in the food- and recycling industry.


Skills Learned: Planning and Organization | Personnel planning | Commercial writing | Building talent pool | Recruit and Select | Sales | Relationship management | Volume recruitment (20+ FTE per vacancy).
